main event: A white point of light was observed moving at fast speed with no sound or trail in Berlin, Germany on 28 March 1948.
interesting points: The observation lasted for an unspecified length of time.
The object was traveling from south to north.
The report suggests a possible astronomical explanation such as a meteor, but deems it very unlikely.
The document concludes that there is insufficient data for evaluation.
The incident is categorized as unclassified, indicating the lack of a definitive explanation.
